titleStmt.title: A defence of the doctrines of the Holy Trinity and incarnation placed in their due light in answer to a letter, written to the clergy of both universities.
titleStmt.author: Bury, Arthur, 1624-1713.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Bury by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: pages cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
